Posts.Content: Jun 20, 2012 12:53AM MamaMiss wrote: I'll pray you get positive results tmrw!!! I have MY biopsy tmrw. Pink mottled rash on breast. 10 days on antibiotic....rash is muuuuich lighter, much lighter but not gone. I have no other symptoms and haven't for 2 weeks but of course I'm still terrified bc I know IBC can present with only a rash. :( Let us know what you here, we are rooting for you!!!! Warmly, Missy

With love, Missy
